author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
At a time when Union HRD Minister Smriti Irani refuted any caste battle in the suicide of a Dalit student of the University of Hyderabad, Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar on Wednesday said the death happened because “an environment of intolerance is developing in society.” “It’s a matter of concern that a Dalit student is forced to take his life over unpleasant treatment…the forces that have emerged in the post-liberalisation phase have created an environment of intolerance in society which poses danger to growth in the country,” Mr. Kumar told journalists here.

He also demanded an impartial inquiry into the incident.
title: Intolerance developing in society: Nitish
